name: Queue Trainer
description:
*to download the game for free, click "No thanks, take me to downloads*

Queue Trainer is an app aimed at training your mouse coordination and improve your accuracy in both FPS and MOBA style games.  Each set of practice modes spawn a random distribution of targets to promote better reactions as well as improved precision and accuracy.  Additionally, these practice modes feature a minimap, which is designed to help with map awareness by showing where possible enemies are coming from. The FPS practice also features a flash band warning and overlay to help improve reaction times against enemy flashes.
